channel.title: Learning on The Hydrant
channel.description: Recent content in Learning on The Hydrant

item.title: More English
item.description: I was amused by these so I had to post them. Mireille is learning English really quickly. Not all is worthy of recording as most is mundane, but there are a few… She loves to eat! And she loves to try new food - but she doesn’t always like the food that she’s trying. When she happens to try something that she doesn’t like she says “I like this uh-uh.”
